title: NBC's Paris Olympics Opening Ceremony in IMAX
overview: For the first time ever, experience the world's biggest event on the world's biggest screens! It's NBCâ€™s broadcast of the Opening Ceremony of the Paris Olympics, live in IMAX theatres. Witness a ceremony with classic Parisian splendor and style, a star-studded cast of performers, and a spectacular parade of athletes in boats down the River Seine, past the city's most majestic landmarks.
